detail_desc: Lined bikini top with removable inserts and a decorative double layer of mesh frills. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, a metal fastener at the back, a silicone trim at the top and side support.
Blouse in an airy patterned viscose weave with a round neck, buttons down the back and long sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined. Slim Fit – a fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Fitted top in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, visible zip down the front and long sleeves.

Sleeveless, V-neck dress in woven fabric with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and a scalloped neckline. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt with pleats at the top. Lined.
Glittery waist bag that changes colour when viewed from different angles. Zip at the front and an adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener. Lined. Size 7x12x30 cm.
Metal rings in various designs.
Sunhat in a cotton weave with ears on top and ties under the chin. Lined.
Lace bikini briefs with a mid waist with narrow straps, a lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.

Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and straight-cut sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Wide ribbing at the hem and a longer layer in lace with a scalloped edge. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit.
Short, one-shoulder fitted dress in textured jersey with three flounces at the top.
Cropped top in sturdy jersey in a narrow cut at the top with thin shoulder straps and a sequined front.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with a washed look. Elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts and a small frill trim at the hem. Ties at the back and back of the neck.
Glittery leggings in stretch, patterned jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short A-line dress in a cotton weave with gathered seams on the skirt. Square neckline front and back and short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and hems. Unlined.
3/4-length leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Weekend bag in a nylon weave with a zip and two handles at the top and an adjustable shoulder strap. Discreet outer compartment with a zip, an open compartment at one short side and two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size approx. 22x34x40 cm.

Ankle-length trousers in twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend. High waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt resembling a rope and a zip fly with two buttons. Pockets in the side seams, welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.

Trousers in an airy cotton weave. Relaxed fit with an elasticated waist and tapered legs with elasticated hems. Diagonal side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and fake back pockets.

Shorts in a viscose and cotton weave containing some linen with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Elastication at the back of the waist, pleats at the top, side pockets and short legs. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini top in soft velour with removable inserts and no fasteners.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, fine-knit lambswool with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, discreet pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fabric cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable tab at the back.
Short shorts in soft, ribbed jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and small frill trim at the hems.

Kangol x H&M. Oversized hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front. Lined hood, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, jersey-lined hood and a zip at the top. Low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in soft, rib-knit organic cotton with buttons down the front and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves, front pockets and no buttons.
Tube scarf in a soft, rib knit. Width 32 cm, circumference approx. 120 cm.
Shirt in airy cotton with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a gathered yoke at the back. long sleeves with buttoned cuffs,and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Woven scarf with a soft, brushed finish and fringe trims on the short sides. Size 60x200 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.

Rain coat in water-repellent functional fabric with a drawstring hood, press-studs down the front and side pockets. Long raglan sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs. Unlined. The coat can be folded and packed easily into its storage bag which has an elasticated drawstring at the top. Size of bag 9x21 cm. The coat has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Long, 5-pocket denim shorts with a regular waist, zip fly and button, slightly lower crotch and slim legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a wide tie collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with an embroidered motif at the top, narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline and a tie-detail at the front of the hem.
All-in-one suit in soft fleece with a print motif, jersey-lined hood and contrasting colour zip down the front. Side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Sleeveless sports top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and an opening and ties at the back of the hem.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Straight-cut top in cotton jersey with short, voluminous puff sleeves in a crisp cotton weave with concealed elastication.
Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll-edge ribbing around the opening and cuffs. No buttons.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with frill-trimmed sleeves.
Shirt woven in a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Baby Exclusive. Jumper in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with buttons at the back, long raglan sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Imitation suede cap. Lined.
Knee-length skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip at the back, a high waist with pleats and a narrow tie belt, and discreet pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend. Foldover, shaft with a lace frill.
Trousers in washed twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with seams at the knees and ribbed hems.

Spot off! Grease and dirt live in constant fear of this gentle but effective stain remover. Spray onto the stain before washing. Concentrated formula – a little goes a long way. 300 ml. For contents and further information, see www.hm.com/takecare.

Puffer jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, lined hood. High collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard and fabric tab with a text print. Zipped side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jacket is recycled.

Imitation suede espadrilles with open sides, an adjustable strap with a metal buckle, elastication at the back, and a braided jute trim around the soles. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Platform 4 cm.
Short dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck trimmed with a flounce that continues down to the waist. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and an elasticated waist. Lined.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline and slits at the hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Jacket in a viscose and linen weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Flap chest pockets, flap patch pockets with a button at the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Sports shorts in fast-drying jersey with contrasting colour trims, a wide, elasticated waistband and a print motif on the front.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey with a flounce at the top.
Short, sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a scalloped edge around the neckline and armholes. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Dressing gown in terry with a hood and zip down the front with a chin guard.
Trousers in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist in a relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch. Pockets in the side seams and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with worn details in a looser fit with a jersey panel at the waist for optimum comfort, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fitted, sleeveless dress in ribbed jersey.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and short legs. Press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Knee-length skirt in jersey crêpe with a high waist with concealed elastication, a wrapover front with a draped knot detail at one side and an asymmetric hem.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of dungarees in soft organic cotton. Bodysuit in patterned jersey with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch. Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with straps that cross at the back and fasten at the front, an elasticated waist, kangaroo pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
